publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1375 Chris Ballance: Visit of His Holiness the Dalai Lama-That the Parliament welcomes His Holiness the Dalai Lama; is honoured by his presence, and recognises and applauds his great contribution in his teachings to furthering world peace. Supported by: Shiona Baird*, Mark Ballard*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Patrick Harvie*, Robin Harper*, Linda Fabiani*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1375 Visit of His Holiness the Dalai Lama (lodged on 1 June 2004) Elaine Smith*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-1375 Chris Ballance: Visit of His Holiness the Dalai Lama-That the Parliament welcomes His Holiness the Dalai Lama; is honoured by his presence, and recognises and applauds his great contribution in his teachings to furthering world peace. Supported by: Shiona Baird, Mark Ballard, Eleanor Scott, Mr Mark Ruskell, Patrick Harvie, Robin Harper, Linda Fabiani, Dr Elaine Murray, Rosie Kane, Elaine Smith, Mike Pringle
S2M-1375 Visit of His Holiness the Dalai Lama (lodged on 1 June 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1375 Visit of His Holiness the Dalai Lama (lodged on 1 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
